text: The Turkish Revolutionaries were an irregular Subsidiary of the Turkish National Movement that were completely autonomous of their superior founded in the ending years of World War I they've been known for their Marching into the Armenian capital while Turkey was winning in major modern Turkish cities like Van, Trabzon, and Kars making Armenia giving up 50% of Armenian land lent by the Treaty of Sevres and giving up all their territorial claims. The Turkish revolutionaries Might have been involved in many other wars that the Government of the Grand National Assembly has fought in which includes the Greco - Turkish war, Franco Turkish war, and the Turkish - Armenian war. Category:History of Turkey
title: Turkish revolutionaries
